title: Tomato, chorizo and green pepper mini quiches
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '125g butter, at room temperature', '225g plain flour', '1 large pinch salt', 'water', 'For the filling', '3 eggs', '4 tablespoons creme fraiche', '100ml milk', '18 to 24 cherry tomatoes', '8 slices chorizo, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped']
